name: The Flight to Kremlin
description:
Entry for Historically Accurate Game Jam.

A game about the aviator Mathias Rust, who flew from Helsinki, Finland to the Red Square in Moscow during the cold war.

Controls:

-AD or Arrow Keys

-Space to control altitude

Credits:

  • Programming by Henuli
  • 3D and other visuals by Sukellusvene
  • Title screen and textures by RetroBard
  • Game music and sounds by HertzSmith

Resources used:

Audio

  • Cakewalk by Bandlab (https://www.bandlab.com/products/cakewalk)
  • Spitfire Audio - BBC Symphony Orchestra 3 (https://www.spitfireaudio.com/bbcso/ Attained for free)
  • dexed (https://asb2m10.github.io/dexed/)
  • OB-XD 2.2 (https://www.discodsp.com/obxd/)

Images

  • NATO flag (https://fi.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nato#/media/Tiedosto:Flag_of_NATO.svg)
  • Warsaw Pact (https://www.pinclipart.com/pindetail/mhThi_east-berliners-attempted-to-cross-the...)

Tools Used

  • Unity 3D
  • Paint tool SAI
  • Blender
